title: Mobile Flipped Learning-Based Large-Scale Applied Learning Design: Managerial Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device usage skills and fundamental leadership experience as an administrator
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course for corporate managers/leaders to enhance social relationship management and leadership competencies. Features a blended structure of self-directed mobile learning and offline practice.

learning_goals: Learners complete pre-learning materials provided on mobile platforms with over 80% accuracy using the flipped learning model
Learners apply three or more leadership strategies through interaction-based problem-solving activities with peers in face-to-face workshops
Learners demonstrate the competency to apply learned content to real work situations by achieving 85+ points (out of 100) on the final summative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
